readable.title: 3416339125_0860d3d1eb
readable.content: A man in a white shirt and sunglasses and a man in a black shirt and sunglasses sit at a table with four beer bottles . There are two guys sitting around a table , both with beers in their hands . Two men drinking beers at a table Two men in sunglasses sit at a table drinking beer . Two men sit at a small round table and drink beer .
